name: Pole Position Remake
description:
A remake of the 1982 racing sim Pole Position made by students at the National High School Game Academy (2022) for a weeklong game jam.  Race to qualify in the Grand Prix and compete against your friends!

Controls:
ENTER: Start the game!
WASD: Accelerate/decelerate, turn left/right.
ESC: Open the pause menu.
SPACE: Shift gears (low/high).

Credits:
Larry Ye: Producer, Artist
Tina Chen: Artist
Louis Ye: Sound Designer, Artist
Ryder Schmelzle: Programmer
Davis Germain: Programmer
